title: Silent Prejudice
description: They say the truth can set you free, but it can’t undo the past.A past filled with secrets, lies, and heartache. Zeno De Rossi unleashed a bomb when he told me the truth about our families.He thought an explanation would bring us closer.But how can I trust a man who has kept so many secrets?How can I love a man who has caused so much pain?Uncertainty haunts my every thought, but I may not have the luxury of choice.In yet another cruel twist of fate, I’ve drawn the attention of a monster.A man obsessed with ruining me.I see no option but to put my life in Zeno’s hands.Like it or not, he’s the only one who can keep me safe.But will my heart be safe from him?Silent Prejudice is the thrilling conclusion to The Savage Pride Duet—a classic tale of romance retold in a world of danger, deception, and murder.
author: Jill Ramsower
